https://lih.kg/1926864

Push
Let's make awesome people fucking famous

I lived through Fucking SARS in Beijing and Hong Kong in 2003 and was proud that I did not wear a Fucking Mask. “Fucking Masks are for Fucking cowards,” I said. “Everyone knows that Fucking surgical Masks can’t filter Fucking Viruses out of air,” I said.

I was Fucking wrong. I Fucking missed the point.

Fucking surgical masks keep you from spraying droplets on other people when you talk, cough or sneeze. These droplets might contain Fucking viruses which will Fucking infect other people. Fucking masks protect other people as much or even more than they fucking protect you.

The turning point for me was in February 2020 when I was on a Fucking flight from Hong Kong to Hanoi. Everyone on the Fucking flight, except for the row of people ahead and behind me, was wearing a Fucking mask.

The people behind me were Fucking coughing and Fucking sneezing. I could Fucking feel their Fucking droplet projectiles flying by my Fucking bald head. It was Fucking not cool. I wish they had worn Fucking masks.

quote.msg:
I lived through Fucking SARS in Beijing and Hong Kong in 2003 and was proud that I did not wear a Fucking Mask. “Fucking Masks are for Fucking cowards,” I said. “Everyone knows that Fucking surgical Masks can’t filter Fucking Viruses out of air,” I said.

I was Fucking wrong. I Fucking missed the point.

Fucking surgical masks keep you from spraying droplets on other people when you talk, cough or sneeze. These droplets might contain Fucking viruses which will Fucking infect other people. Fucking masks protect other people as much or even more than they fucking protect you.

The turning point for me was in February 2020 when I was on a Fucking flight from Hong Kong to Hanoi. Everyone on the Fucking flight, except for the row of people ahead and behind me, was wearing a Fucking mask.

The people behind me were Fucking coughing and Fucking sneezing. I could Fucking feel their Fucking droplet projectiles flying by my Fucking bald head. It was Fucking not cool. I wish they had worn Fucking masks.

replies.msg:
我03年經歷過北京同香港嘅閪沙士，為自己曾經冇撚戴口罩而自豪。「啲鳩口罩係俾懦夫撚樣戴嘅。」我曾經咁講：「個個都知道，啲鳩外科口罩隔唔撚到空氣中嘅病毒。」

我錯撚哂。我完全miss撚咗個重點。

啲鳩口罩其實係幫你講嘢，咳嗽，或者打乞痴時，擋住你嘅飛沫。因為飛沫可以攜帶住閪病毒，然後惹鳩俾其他人。你戴鳩口罩其實除咗保撚護住你之外，都同樣保護其他人。

改變我嘅轉捩點，係20年二月一程由香港飛河內嘅撚屌航班。呢程撚屌航班除咗我前面同後面一排乘客，全鳩部人都有戴口罩。

坐我後面嘅人又鳩咳又起撚勢打乞痴。屌我個光頭feel撚到啲鳩飛沫。成個感覺好撚差，當刻我好希望佢哋有戴鳩口罩。
想要支持佢 做岩嘅事情 show 到香港人嘅支持比佢

I lived through Fucking SARS in Beijing and Hong Kong in 2003 and was proud that I did not wear a Fucking Mask. “Fucking Masks are for Fucking cowards,” I said. “Everyone knows that Fucking surgical Masks can’t filter Fucking Viruses out of air,” I said.

I was Fucking wrong. I Fucking missed the point.

Fucking surgical masks keep you from spraying droplets on other people when you talk, cough or sneeze. These droplets might contain Fucking viruses which will Fucking infect other people. Fucking masks protect other people as much or even more than they fucking protect you.

The turning point for me was in February 2020 when I was on a Fucking flight from Hong Kong to Hanoi. Everyone on the Fucking flight, except for the row of people ahead and behind me, was wearing a Fucking mask.

The people behind me were Fucking coughing and Fucking sneezing. I could Fucking feel their Fucking droplet projectiles flying by my Fucking bald head. It was Fucking not cool. I wish they had worn Fucking masks.

我03年經歷過北京同香港嘅閪沙士，為自己曾經冇撚戴口罩而自豪。「啲鳩口罩係俾懦夫撚樣戴嘅。」我曾經咁講：「個個都知道，啲鳩外科口罩隔唔撚到空氣中嘅病毒。」

啲鳩口罩其實係幫你講嘢，咳嗽，或者打乞痴時，擋住你嘅飛沫。因為飛沫可以攜帶住閪病毒，然後惹鳩俾其他人。你戴鳩口罩其實除咗保撚護住你之外，都同樣保護其他人。

I was Fucking wrong. I Fucking missed the point.

Fucking surgical masks keep you from spraying droplets on other people when you talk, cough or sneeze. These droplets might contain Fucking viruses which will Fucking infect other people. Fucking masks protect other people as much or even more than they fucking protect you.

The turning point for me was in February 2020 when I was on a Fucking flight from Hong Kong to Hanoi. Everyone on the Fucking flight, except for the row of people ahead and behind me, was wearing a Fucking mask.

The people behind me were Fucking coughing and Fucking sneezing. I could Fucking feel their Fucking droplet projectiles flying by my Fucking bald head. It was Fucking not cool. I wish they had worn Fucking masks.

我03年經歷過北京同香港嘅閪沙士，為自己曾經冇撚戴口罩而自豪。「啲鳩口罩係俾懦夫撚樣戴嘅。」我曾經咁講：「個個都知道，啲鳩外科口罩隔唔撚到空氣中嘅病毒。」

我錯撚哂。我完全miss撚咗個重點。

啲鳩口罩其實係幫你講嘢，咳嗽，或者打乞痴時，擋住你嘅飛沫。因為飛沫可以攜帶住閪病毒，然後惹鳩俾其他人。你戴鳩口罩其實除咗保撚護住你之外，都同樣保護其他人。

改變我嘅轉捩點，係20年二月一程由香港飛河內嘅撚屌航班。呢程撚屌航班除咗我前面同後面一排乘客，全鳩部人都有戴口罩。

坐我後面嘅人又鳩咳又起撚勢打乞痴。屌我個光頭feel撚到啲鳩飛沫。成個感覺好撚差，當刻我好希望佢哋有戴鳩口罩。

佢twitter原文未撚完
...Fucking masks protect other people as much or even more than they Fucking protect you. Even if you are young and healthy, you could be unknowingly infected and spread the virus to others.

Don’t be a Super Spreader. No one likes them.

Here are some Fucking easy rules we all should follow:

1. I will #StayTheFuckHome
2. If I can not #StayTheFuckHome, I will #WearAFuckingMask
3. I will not make fun of other people who #WearAFuckingMask

Our goal is to reduce the growth rate in #COVID-19 cases so that they don’t Fucking exceed healthcare system capacity. This is called Flattening the Fucking Curve. Fucking Masks can help us do this.

Visit https://wearafuckingmask.com to learn more about why you should wear a Fucking mask.

Download mask images to add to your profile picture and post a mask selfie to show your support.

Together we can change Fucking behavior and save some Fucking lives.
